title: Academic Year Fall
desc: The fall academic year program is designed to provide students with robotics experience while they are enrolled as a full time student.

title: Academic Year Spring
desc: The spring academic year program is designed to be balanced with a typical second semester workload in school.

title: Summer
desc: RoboReach's Summer program is designed to be a full day experience for the student. As such, students will create larger robots with more features in the summer program than the academic year program.
buildsOffered: Common Build, Challenge Build, Creative Build
